a.span: WDMCS schools will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-20 academic year. Read the latest update on how COVID-19/Coronavirus is impacting our WDMCS community.

li.a: English for Speakers of Other Languages
Become a Project-Based Learning Network Partner Today!

div.h2: Show Your Support with a Tigers Together Yard Sign!
div.a: West Des Moines Community Schools (WDMCS) is excited to announce several custom yard signs to help us all show how much we miss our teachers, students, schools, and honor our Valley senior class. We are partnering with the West Des Moines Community Schools Foundation to offer a custom yard sign for $18, with $6 going back to the Foundation to support our students' educational and nutritional needs. Orders will be open through Sunday, May 3. Click here for more information view more

div.h2: Official WDMCS Plan for Continuous Learning
div.a: To provide the best possible opportunities for all of our students, WDMCS will transition to Voluntary Educational Enrichment Opportunities. Learn what that looks like for students, families, and staff. view more

div.h2: WDMCS Schools Extend WiFi Access for Student Learning
div.a: All West Des Moines Community Schools (WDMCS) school properties recently extended WiFi access to provide a vital resource to families and students without internet access at home. view more

div.h2: WDMCS Board of Education Approves Employee Pay Plan Through April 30
div.a: The WDMCS Board of Education passed a resolution on Monday, April 13, that continues to pay WDMCS teachers and staff their current wages through through Thursday, April 30. The resolution comes amid the global outbreak of COVID-19, a respiratory illness caused by a new coronavirus. view more
